records.location_text_raw: Bulgarian Turkish land border (unknown location), reported in Svilengrad (BGR)
records.uncertainty_note: Migrant's statement does not indicate exact time or place of incident and therefore it cannot be confirmed, where the incident happened and which authority has used the force.

possible_violations.violation_name: Alleged violation of Fundamental Rights - Use of force against migrant
possible_violations.legal_basis: Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations

possible_violations.violation_name: Lack of food and water during detention
possible_violations.legal_basis: Fundamental Rights or international protection obligations

records.context_note: Migrant was interviewed in Svilengrad and complained about use of force by local authorities (beaten with a wire) and lack of food/water during detention. The exact location and time of the incident could not be confirmed, and the investigation was obstructed due to insufficient details.
records.evidence_quote: Alleged violation of Fundamental Rights - Use of force against migrant, reported in Svilengrad
